title: Rajapur Kanspur
text:
Rajapur Kanspur is a village in <a href="Maharajganj%2C%20Raebareli">Maharajganj</a> block of <a href="Rae%20Bareli%20district">Rae Bareli district</a>, <a href="Uttar%20Pradesh">Uttar Pradesh</a>, <a href="India">India</a>. As of 2011, its population is 964, in 160 households. It has one primary school and no healthcare facilities. It is located 9 km from Maharajganj, the block headquarters. The main staple foods are wheat and rice.
The <a href="1961%20Census%20of%20India">1961 census</a> recorded Rajapur Kanspur as comprising 2 hamlets, with a total population of 422 people (216 male and 206 female), in 101 households and 99 physical houses. The area of the village was given as 337 <a href="acre">acre</a>s.
The <a href="1981%20Census%20of%20India">1981 census</a> recorded Rajapur Kanspur as having a population of 476 people, in 105 households, and having an area of 135.98 <a href="hectare">hectare</a>s.
